name: Brink Of Insanity
description:
On The Brink Of Insanity

By Rhaskia, Hack111 and Azreal.

Please rate our game on the submission page!

Please give feedback in comments!

WASD or Arrow keys to move, click  or spacebar to shoot.

Story

Dave is stuck in a hospital bed.

He is on the brink of becoming insane.

You are a lifesaving nanobot.

Defeat the viruses inside his brain and save him from insanity.
